headline: Nucor Corporation (NUE) Appoints Insider Jack Sullivan to CFO Position
summary: Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) is among the 10 Best Steel Stocks to Buy Right Now. On February 20, 2026, Reuters reported that Nucor Corporation (NYSE:NUE) chose insider Jack Sullivan as chief financial officer, effective March 1. Sullivan is succeeding Steve Laxton, who was appointed president and chief operating officer at the beginning of the year. Sullivan […]
